header: Give your instagram store a new home
description: "DM/call to order" can be frustrating. Wow your customers with a fluid, well-designed shopping experience.
Reduce purchasing friction. Make it simple for customers to buy what they want.

header: Automate receipts and thank you messages
description: Don't leave your customers in the dark. Increase their trust by immediately thanking them for their purchase, issuing a receipt and providing all your contact details.

header: Clean, simple dashboard to manage your products
description: Track and manage all your products. You can also preview of each product to make sure everything looks just right.
